item.dreamtinker.narcissus_wing.descript:
Memory, Wish, Soul, Persona, Reason......This ritual blade that exists because of you.
 This dream only meaning for you, befor story ends
tooltip.nigrescence_antimony.desc1: Void-Antimony, Corruptum Antimonii,Antimony of the First Death......Names so manifold it doth bear
tooltip.nigrescence_antimony.desc2: And lo, the means of its grasping are but simple.
tooltip.star_regulus.desc1: This is no true Magnum Opus—yet its essence quivers on the threshold of that sacred transmutation.
tooltip.star_regulus.desc2: By the arcane forge of Tinker’s Construct, through eldritch craft and secret rites, thou hast summoned them into being.
tooltip.void_pearl.desc1: Reform by the darkest deepest null
tooltip.dreamtinker.memory_cast_1: Born in a breath, often following, rest with you
tooltip.dreamtinker.memory_cast_2: Found in Algae sea, fire cannot touch, should not separated
tooltip.dreamtinker.wish_cast_1: Born in an initial, often following, to lie with you in the long sleep
tooltip.dreamtinker.wish_cast_2: free of the wages and fruits of sin，allie of the wages and fruits of sin,to lie with you in the long sleep
tooltip.dreamtinker.soul_cast_1: Born in an instant, often contradicting, always united
tooltip.dreamtinker.soul_cast_2: Even after all flesh, bone, and entrails have been sliced away, I still lie nestled with you in the marrow that remains.
tooltip.dreamtinker.soul_cast_3: Born in undead, resources of soul, reform as of lost shape
tooltip.dreamtinker.soul_cast_4: Condense Soul, too close to the sun, reform as of lost shape
tooltip.dreamtinker.soul_cast_5: The Life weight wing, the heart red, verdant and graceful
tooltip.dreamtinker.persona_cast_2: The first droplet, born in fire, always united
tooltip.dreamtinker.reason_cast_1: Born in huge dream, never awake, always united
tooltip.dreamtinker.reason_cast_2: Born in long dream, never aware, always united
tooltip.dreamtinker.reason_cast_3: Hung dream finally awake，Long dream inevitable aware，But as pure as usual
tooltip.dreamtinker.white_peach: embody life's delights and pleasures, but are equally fragile and short-lived
tooltip.dreamtinker.narcissus_2: What lies spread all over the valley?

material.dreamtinker.moonlight_ice.flavo: This piece of ice takes its form from the moonlight—its plenitude and its absences.
